parameter.name: downloadBinaries
parameter.label: Download Stream Binaries
parameter.description: Download the stream binaries for go2rtc and ffmpeg if not already present on the system PATH

parameter.name: useStun
parameter.label: Use STUN for external IP discovery
parameter.description: Use STUN for external IP discovery. This will allow camera streams to work behind NATs when outside your local network (e.g. when using the openHAB cloud service). STUN will incur an approximately 5 second delay starting the stream as it discovers your external IP.
